title: Client slow
body: For me and my friends the client new or old will not load and if it does it just goes so slow and won't do anything, I finally got into champion select and everything was black so i had to dodge, my internet is fine on everything except the client.

replies.body:
Yea I've noticed this myself. Thanks for helping confirm this with your report. I'll let someone know.

UPDATE: Team has been investigating for a little now, as we determine the source of the problem. As of now it appears to be improving, so you may be able to log in again now.

FINAL UPDATE: The problem has been resolved as of 12AM.

some people seem to be working fine but others cannot login. on the new client it gets stuck at authenticating while on the old it gets stuck on logging in. am one of those unable to login. please post an update in server status soon :)
I swear to god riot fix ur fucking goddam shit boxes.
there will be repercussions for failure not to meet the fix within the next fifteen minutes
Phew thought it was just me, glad to know it's just riot failing.
The client just straight up froze in champ select had to dodge
it happened to me 2. it's happening right NOW.

>>>>>>>>I FOUND A WAY TO FIX<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<|
guys switch to legacy client and just wait ....i hated it but it will work not going into detail of it try it takes about 5mins
I am stuck at the 'authenticating' screen as well. rebooted my computer and it is working fine.
My friends n me tried so hard to login on, lol, all failed.  LOGGIN ON FOREVER!
Same. I tried relogging back on again but it's still the same. Everything is either really slow / not loading

I relogged cause it was being slow and then I got spammed with a bunch of "An unknown error has occured". Managed to log off and back in and now I'm stuck logging in to chat service. (on legacy client if that helps)
same thing happened, tried relogged again and got stuck when trying to login
50%of my friends can't join because this........
lol...I cant log in is it because of this?
